name: The Saikidou Incident
description:
The Saikidou Incident is a puzzle game where you must stop a catastrophic incident from destroying the Saikidou facility.  Explore the facility, interact with your coworkers to gain clues, and experience some strange effects of the facility's futuristic… pills?

This game was created for Brackey's Game Jam 2023.1

NOTE: There are numerous issues with the in-browser version of the game. The best way to play is to download an executable for your OS. Thanks for playing!

Controls:

MoveWASDJump
SpaceCrouchCInteractLMB

Walkthrough [SPOILERS]:

Key card:
1. Buy a burger before the shop closes
2. After the shop closes, give the guy nearby the burger
3. Go to the beach room and buy a drink
4. Give the guy on the beach the drink

Pass code:
1. Talk to the guy in the bathroom to learn a code
2. Enter the janitor's closet and sneak into the mainframe room
3. Cancel the manager's meeting before 2:00
4. Talk to the manager to learn an employee's name
5. Find out where that employee sits
6. Read the passcode at their desk when they aren't there (meeting isn't cancelled)
